title: Is 'Train to Pakistan' by Khushwant Singh worth the read? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, of course, that gives the real picture of massacre or sacrifices of the communities of both the sides on partition of India. People of the present day may not be knowing, what price the people of both sides had to pay just to fulfill the lust and greed of just a handful of the politicians of that time.
Absolutely. It is written with a deep compassion and understanding and observation of people of different kinds in pre-partition India. You will remember the story long after you read it
